::Spears::

She smiled as she walked with him.  She had no idea her spark could 
race like it did, just by taking his arm.  She felt safe when she was 
around him.  Felt like everything would be alright, just by having 
him near her.
She rested her head on his shoulder as they walked.  She was happy 
being with him.
" I hope so," she said in a dreamy voice. No matter where they went, 
she was thrilled that he was there.
 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker smiles, walking out of the Ark and guiding Spears along. 
The feel of 
> her arm against his excited him, more than he thought a touch 
could. His 
> smile deepens, looking at her.
> 
> "There's a nice place a little ways from here," Striker says to 
Spears, "If 
> it hasn't been destroyed by attacks yet."
